website_summaries.verdict: The included straw with this insulated, stemless glass makes it easy to drink out of no matter what you’re sipping on.
pros: Purchase includes coordinating straw and lid, which is a nice touch and makes it easy to sip out of this insulated glass
cons: Straw is not as durable as the cup

customer_reviews.title: I love this cup
customer_reviews.text: I love this cup! It’s the perfect size for wine..I mean, Mommy’s juice! ;) I love the stainless steel; I feel like it’s cleaner. I knocked it from a 5 to a 4 star because the colors are not accurately displayed. I ordered the seafoam color, and I feel like the color is more baby blue. It does match the product photo displayed though. Just something to keep in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Cannon

customer_reviews.title: Only for use with straw.
customer_reviews.text: Super cute. But you can’t drink from the lid. You can only use a straw. The lid leaks and when you drink from it air sucks out of the lid not allowing you to take liquid into your mouth. Pretty disappointed. I will probably return. The straw itself is just hard plastic...
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen Smith

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny!
customer_reviews.text: Great!!!! Bought this as a gift for a friend and it is perfect. The finish has held up well so far, and it doe get a bit of abuse. It travels in her purse, car, etc, and looks like new. It keeps white wine chilled and reds at the perfect temp. Also, hold a good pour of wine, so you don't constantly have to go for refills.
customer_reviews.author: CurvyFox86

customer_reviews.title: Keeps drinks enjoyable!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cup so much! It’s fantastic! I can carry cold drinks without freezing my hands and carry hot drinks without burning myself because the outside temperature doesn’t change based on what’s on the inside. Keeps drinks hot/cold for a long time! I love it! I also added some stickers to it to make it decorative.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cup for my girlfriend because her hands are always cold whenever she drinks beverages, then she would want try to warm her hands up by trying to place them on my back or anywhere on my body. But since I purchased this cup, problem solved and she can drink the coldest drink in the fridge/freezer and I will forever be safe...lol
customer_reviews.author: Rudy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for drinking wine while walking the dog! My rosé stays cold and I haven't split a drop!
customer_reviews.author: JLEmry

customer_reviews.title: I love this cup
customer_reviews.text: I love this cup. It keeps beverages extremely cold overnight. I mostly used sit this winter at my bedside following surgery and it is perfect! I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Carol B. Major

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my dad for Christmas. It is great quality and I love the color. I think he will love it since he just recently got into wine.
customer_reviews.author: Valorie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute, I had them personalized for some friends... everyone loves them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Farnan

customer_reviews.title: Cup with straw
customer_reviews.text: My shipment came with a broken straw. Overall it’s a decent purchase, just don’t count on the straw.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this tumbler and uses it every day! She hand washes it and it still looks just like new two months after we purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: BAS2k3

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for wine!
customer_reviews.text: This little cup is perfect for wine, margaritas and sangria. Put in freezer a few minutes before using for a start to a nice cold drink.
customer_reviews.author: Paizlee

customer_reviews.title: I had to put her name on it and she could not be happier.
customer_reviews.text: I know it's supposed to be a wine tumbler but my grand daughter wanted one because it was so cute. Of course, I had to put her name on it and she could not be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Ella Helms

customer_reviews.title: No straw! Scratches on lid!
customer_reviews.text: Not happy...I ordered the black one. It just arrived and it doesn’t even have a straw with it and the lid is scratched up. Came in a crappy box. Not like when I’ve ordered before. Thinking about returning.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this tumbler! I have bigger insulated cups but love this one because it fits in my hand so nicely. Perfect thing to protect my wine from bugs and the Georgia sun.
customer_reviews.author: GA Girl

customer_reviews.title: She uses a straw to drink and this allows her to enjoy her wine at the temp it should be
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my mom who suffers from Bell's Palsey. She uses a straw to drink and this allows her to enjoy her wine at the temp it should be.
customer_reviews.author: cubby1

customer_reviews.title: Missing straws!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these due to the description says straw included. Well I didn’t get a straw for either cup! Not happy being these were for a customer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Double walled so no more sweating all over my table! The drink stays cold and the outside is room temp. Nice!

customer_reviews.title: Like
customer_reviews.text: I have only had it a couple days but I can’t complain so far

customer_reviews.title: Good flexible cup
customer_reviews.text: Works good. Doesn’t leak yet. I used by wife and she likes it. We use it cold or hot and that works.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the color. Keeps our wine cold out in the hot tub. Easy to hold

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME GIFT
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mostly as a joke for one of my best guy friends who cannot hold any drink, especially wine, without spilling it. After witnessing him use this product, he dropped it (which was expected) but come to find out none of the wine spilled out of it. Definitely was a successful purchase after the occurrence of that event. Highly recommend! Also very nice quality. Might even buy it again in the future for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seafoam green is beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive adult sippy cup. My girlfriend knocks over her drink every time she comes over. I mean 100%. So I got this for her to use. It's a complete success.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic straw
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I bought this one was for the straw. The straw that came with the one I ordered (black one) was shattered. Cheap plastic. I’m sure there are better alternatives with better straws.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Keeps wine cold ans design is so cute!!

customer_reviews.title: The color cover on these wine cups is very odd.
customer_reviews.text: The color cover on these wine cups is very odd, making it hard to customize with permanent vinyl. I had to heat my vinyl once it was applied to try and make sure that it would stay.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Paint chipped and no straw included, pain to ship back.

customer_reviews.title: Great cup! Was looking for one as a gift
customer_reviews.text: Great cup! Was looking for one as a gift, and ended up getting one for myself as well. It's precious and made well. Would definitely buy again in the future for additional gifts.

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great tumbler - recommend! I haven't used it for keeping beverage hot. For keeping my wine chilled, it does the job.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and sturdy feeling
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and sturdy feeling. I got it for my wife to have OJ in it at work. She loved it.

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. Delivered as promised in two days and seems to be of very good quality.

customer_reviews.title: I gave them as gifts to women who love wine, and they were thrilled with them
customer_reviews.text: I gave them as gifts to women who love wine, and they were thrilled with them. The lid and straw are the best things with the cup. Other wine tumblers are made the same, but don't come with lids.

customer_reviews.title: Dad loves his portable wine glass! I'm his favorite kid!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my dad. He just moved into a senior community and wanted something to take his wine to dinner. He loves it! he says it is the perfect amount of wine and is easy to carry down.

customer_reviews.text: Really cute adult "sippy cup". Doesn't keep my drink cold for a long period of time but I love it anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A. Martini

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't keep anything cold. I have frozen my drink ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't keep anything cold. I have frozen my drink I have even put the cup in the freezer and my drink never stays cold. It is a cute little tumbler though.
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

customer_reviews.title: This is a great wine glass
customer_reviews.text: This is a great wine glass, stylish and attractive as well as functional. The person who received this as a gift from me loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Function and Beauty
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived on Christmas Eve, just as promised and in time to be a part of a gift for a friend. She LOVED it, after a quick wash with warm soapy water she filled her glass with some chilled wine commented how much she not only loved the color (bright, happy pink) and that the straw matched but her wine stayed at the perfect temperature all evening without having to even thinking about putting ice or drinking warm wine. I am so glad to found this product. I know I will be back to get a few for my friends as gifts and perhaps I'll get to keep one or two for myself.
customer_reviews.author: ChooseKind67

customer_reviews.title: Great for Hammocks!
customer_reviews.text: Now that fall has arrive, you can find me outside in my hammock reading and drinking wine. But...do you know how hard it is to drink wine in a hammock? NOT ANYMORE. This little baby saved the day! It is durable, holds a lot of wine, and is dang cute. BONUS - the straw has a notch at the end so it won't fall out. You can even hold your wine glass by the straw. Highly recommend to any outdoorsy wino like myself :) PS - Mine came with a small dent, pictured, but the thing still functions perfectly so oh well, still 5/5.
customer_reviews.author: Alex fo Falex

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Company
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a stylist insulated glass. I just love the look and style of the double insulated cup. I received it but the matching straw was in multiple pieces in the packaging. I was so disappointed, but decided to keep it and use it without the straw. To my surprise a few weeks later in the mail, I received a replacement straw. I was so excited. I just love this little glass and a BIG THANK YOU, to who ever it was that read the comment and shipped out a straw. What great customer service. I would recommend this glass to my family and friends who are looking for a wonderful glass.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I’m giving it as a gift so it’s nicely wrapped and tucked under the tree so I don’t have any pictures to share. In my rush to get things wrapped, I forgot to share how great it is. It’s solid and the lid fits securely like the ones on a travel coffeee mug. The straw is also a nice size and good quality. It’s not a flimsy one nor is it too tall or too short. I highly recommend if you’re in the market!
customer_reviews.author: WifeMomLove

customer_reviews.title: Love!!!!!—the greastest little cup!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought several for gifts - various colors- every color is nice. I ended up with the pink. I use mine as a water glass on nightstand- cat can’t spill- The Greatest Point- No Water Marks!!!!!! Ice remains after 10 full hours. Price wise - for this cup is so reasonable!!!!! I will be purchasing more. Fro gifts and for me.
customer_reviews.author: Bright spot

customer_reviews.title: I really like how classy these look
customer_reviews.text: I really like how classy these look. i got them for my elders, my dad has a tremor and using a regular glass has become difficult. These Tumbler's look elegant and work very well. The lid is very tight, too tight for an elderly person to wrangle, but it keeps the cup from leaking and the drink cool or warm. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: mutantdustbunny

customer_reviews.title: keeps drinks cold
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to use for small frozen wine drinks. Keeps them cold for a long time.
